Layer.Name: ndfd.conus.llwsdist
Layer.Title: NDFD Forecast conus.llwsdist
Layer.Abstract: This service provides weather forecasts from the National Digital Forecast Database. Day 1-3 forecasts are updated every 30 minutes. Day 4-7 forecasts are updated every 6 hours. "vtit" dimension: "Valid Time / Issuance Time". This WMS endpoint requires only the Valid Time, in the format: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MI. You will get the most recently issued forecast for that valid time. See the GetCapabilities document for available valid times. This service updates immediately upon receiving new forecasts.

Layer.Abstract: This service provides weather forecasts from the National Digital Forecast Database. Day 1-3 forecasts are updated every 30 minutes. Day 4-7 forecasts are updated every 6 hours. "vtit" dimension: "Valid Time / Issuance Time". This WMS endpoint requires only the Valid Time, in the format: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MI. You will get the most recently issued forecast for that valid time. See the GetCapabilities document for available valid times. This service updates immediately upon receiving new forecasts.
